name: Trills
description:
Trills is a local multiplayer game where two players control bird-like creatures.

Master the art of 'Air Jousting' to a backdrop of simplistic visuals, ambient music and satisfying sound effects.

Interactions are simple; jump, flap and turn. The game is incredibly easy to pick up and play.

Use a keyboard or gamepads or a combination of the two.

"It's a lovely little thing to play around with…" – Laura Hudson, Offworld

"A game that turns panicky sparrows into elegant samurai." – Brendan Caldwel, Rock, Paper, Shotgun
